idea-plugin.name: Base16 Horizon Light
idea-plugin.vendor: Michaël Ball (http://github.com/michael-ball/), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Horizon Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Michaël Ball (http://github.com/michael-ball/). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
